These formula are found contained in books scattered across the world.\\n ","color":"reset"}]','["",{"text":"How do you use a formula?","bold":true},{"text":"\\nFormula display the layout of items as you would enter them into one of the three crafting stations. These three are the Infusion Circle, the Alchemy Cauldron, and the Runic Codex.","color":"reset"}]','["",{"text":"Each has their own specific uses and specialities detailed in the next three volumes of this set.\\n"},{"text":"How do I get started?","bold":true},{"text":"\\nThe first thing you need to do is find yourself a crafting station. For the purpose of the tutorial we\'ll be using an Infusion Circle.","color":"reset"}]','["",{"text":"Figure 1 shows how an Infusion Circle is represented in the formula you\'ll find in the wild\\n \\u0020 \\u0020 \\u0020 "},{"text":" Figure 1","color":"gray"},{"text":"\\n \\u0020 \\u0020 \\u0020 \\u0020 \\u0020x\\n \\u0020 \\u0020 \\u0020 x \\u0020x \\u0020x\\n \\u0020 \\u0020x \\u0020x \\u0020 \\u0020 x \\u0020x\\n \\u0020 \\u0020 \\u0020 x \\u0020x \\u0020x\\n \\u0020 \\u0020 \\u0020 \\u0020 \\u0020x","color":"reset"}]','{"text":"A black x will represent an empty item slot in the station\'s layout. The finished product will appear hovering above the centerpiece."}','["",{"text":"Where to find formulas","bold":true,"underlined":true},{"text":"\\nFormulas can be found all cross the world. From cryptic library to sunken village they can be found in all corners. Some formulas will contain multiple blueprints of powerful items and some only one.","color":"reset"}]','{"text":"It is unclear who initially created these formula but they seemed to have no strong system of organization. Some formulas will reference or even require items made from other formulas so it is important to keep a wide selection of them on hand."}','{"text":"Some formulas are more or less common in different locations.
